msg1.bulletin_title: 一只超可怕的哥布林走了过来!

bulletin_message.00:
那只哥布林走近了, 不及反应, 它便开始喊. "骨头! 骨头!" 那是顽皮的, 甚至是稚嫩的声音.

"骨~~~头~~~!" 它继续喊着.

似乎人畜无害.

那是个孩子吗? 哥布林也会有小孩的吗?

很明显它十分欢喜, 蹦蹦跳跳转着圈. "骨头! 骨头! 超多骨头!"

忽然, 耳边响起了一位炉民低沉但不失慈祥的声音. "在这儿啊, 拉特蕾!"

msg3.dialog_title: 现在是一个男人走了过来!

bulletin_message.00:
他穿着北方联盟颜色的衣服. 头发斑白但十分强壮, 他把手放在小哥布林的头上. "乖, 去交朋友吧, 怎么样?"

他注意到了围站着的人. "抱歉. 我是托洛夫, 是旅行者也曾是瓦伦书阁的侦察员."

他轻轻地拍了拍小哥布林, 她又开始了跳来跳去.

msg3.choice_001: 你养了个... 哥布林宠物?

msg3b.dialog_title: 托洛夫看起来有点失望

bulletin_message.00:
"什么?" 他突然怒喝. "不, 别叫她宠物! 她是哥布林 - 不是小松鼠. 他们也是人, 懂吗?"

他咳嗽了两下, 挥了挥手表示歉意.

"不好意思. 只是因为... 我们共同经历了许多, 拉特蕾和我." 他看向她玩耍一根小骨头棒的方向. "可惜愿意接纳哥布林, 甚至愿意尝试理解他们的人都少之又少..."

"拉特蕾对我来说就像是女儿."说着, 他露出了似苦似甜的微笑", 我是她独自活在世上的理由, 而她是我远离书阁的原因. 现在我们俩相依为命!" 他笑着, 像是要把涌上来的过去堵回原处.

"我知道你们很忙, 我们去别处找地方安个帐篷住上几天!" 他挥挥手, 把拉特蕾招呼过去.

"哦, 差点忘记了..." 他挠挠后脑勺, 傻笑着 "接下去我会忙着搭设营地, 无法马上开始捕猎... 你们不介意的话, 能否给小拉特蕾几根骨头呢?"

那个小哥布林听见了兴奋地叫了起来. "骨头! 给骨头!"

托洛夫盯了她一眼 "拉特蕾, 我教你要怎么样的?".

她低下了头 "请...?"

托洛夫笑了 "我们会很感激的, 她特别喜欢雕这些骨头玩!"

"太好了!" 说玩, 他转过身来. "我们就在不远处. 愿你们永远能饱腹穿暖!"

随后便走远了.

bone_gift_quest.title: 给拉特蕾的骨头
bone_gift_quest.dialog_title: 给拉特蕾送去几根骨头
bone_gift_quest.text: 这个小哥布林喜欢雕刻骨头!

bulletin_message.00:
她快速地接过了骨头. "骨头! 骨头!"

在她身后, 托洛夫的营地设置工作也进入了尾声. "拉特蕾, 说谢谢!"

她停下来看着你们. "骨头! 拉特蕾很开心!"

msg1.bulletin_title: 托洛夫和拉特蕾走了过来!

bulletin_message.00:
"又见到你们了, 朋友们!" 那个北方人说着话, 在你们营地旗帜旁放下了一个给宠物喂食的碗. "拉特蕾表现出了骨刻家的潜力!"

"骨头!" 他看起来高兴且感激.

托洛夫则很是自豪的样子 "她刚做的, 你们收下吧."

托洛夫看着周围, 捻了捻胡子 "你们南方人们没刻过骨头吗."

他扬起眉毛, 明显是想到了什么 "我在教拉特蕾, 多一个学徒也不会怎样. 马上我们就要去打猎旅行了, 如果愿意的话, 我可以教你们的石匠骨刻." 他笑着 "只要你们准备好接下来几天我们外出所需要的物资."

"还有骨头!" 拉特蕾欢呼道.

"没事!" 拉特蕾笑着.

托洛夫拍着她的头, 然后接着说道 "她学得很快. 骨刻技艺如同星辰一样古老, 是我族人民的重要技能之一." 他把手放在心口 "有趣的是, 骨刻亦是哥布林的传统."

托洛夫有点失望.

"嗯, 我肯定你知道怎样是最有利的!" 他笑了笑, 深吸了一口气 "我们要开始捕猎旅行了, 然后继续我们的生活. 我们以后可能会回到这里, 到时候如果你想重新考虑下的话...!"

他点点头, 拉特蕾像每个人挥手告别, 然后他们走远了.

refuse.choice_000: 一路平安, 我们会再见面的!

accept.bulletin_title: 托洛夫和拉特蕾十分高兴!

bulletin_message.00:
托洛夫开心地说 "哈, 好! 我就知道你会同意的. 骨刻的魅力让人难以拒绝!"

"骨头!" 拉特蕾再次欢呼着 "骨头朋友!"

"我们回到营地准备, 准备好了就把你的石匠送过来!"

msg1.choice_000: 一路平安, 我们会再见面的!
msg1.bulletin_title: 托洛夫 & 拉特蕾离开了!

bulletin_message.00:
托洛夫叹了口气. "好吧, 有时候事情总是不如预期, 不是吗?" 他笑了笑 "但我确信日后会再有交集. 拉特蕾肯定想回来的."

"骨头朋友!" 她欢呼着.

"或许下一次我们到来时, 能教你们一些骨刻技巧! 那么, 我们走吧!"

msg1.bulletin_title: 拉特蕾 runs into your town!

bulletin_message.00:
"BONES!" she cheers as she jumps around the town banner "We back, bone friend!"

Behind her, 托洛夫 and the Mason calmly approach while having a friendly conversation.

"There you go!" says 托洛夫 as they approach, he laughs "Your Mason is back safely, well fed and full of knowledge to share!"

拉特蕾 silently approaches and holds on to the leg of her father, who continues "I'm afraid it is time to say goodbye, now. Hopefully this knowledge will serve you very well from now on."

He smiles. "May the stars always shine the brightest upon your town. Farewell!"

bone_recipes_unlock.bulletin_title: New Bone Carving recipes for the Mason!

accept.bulletin_title: 托洛夫 & 拉特蕾 have returned!

bulletin_message.00:
"Many greetings! It seems our paths have crossed again." he smiles.

拉特蕾 jumps in front of him "BONE FRIEND!"

They laugh and 托洛夫 continues "She insisted to come. We have a proposition!" he shows some of his own bone carved tools as he continues "We're going on another hunting trip nearby and maybe a Mason would be interested in learning bone carving?"

"Good to know you have interest!" he smiles, opening his arms wide "We can leave as soon as you're ready. But since we'll be out for a couple of days, some supplies wouldn't hurt... If that is alright!"

拉特蕾 waves from behind his legs. "AND BONES!"

"And bones, of course!" he laughs.

farewell.bulletin_title: 托洛夫 & 拉特蕾 are leaving!

bulletin_message.00:
"Oh, I understand." he gives a gentle yet disappointed smile.

"No bones?" 拉特蕾 sobs.

"Maybe next time, right? I'm sure they must be very busy. Sometimes this is just how things are!" he seems genuinely interested in teaching others, maybe someday he might return.

"We wish you the best of luck and may the stars always shine upon your town!"

highlands.description: 满是崎岖的峡谷和陡峭的山崖, 还有众多河流湖泊. 这里是高原民族的家园.

spring.description: 高原上的春日是一切重新开始的季节, 常常伴随着大风天气, 还有时会下起雪来. 但晚雪并不是很常见.

summer.description: 高原上的夏日是温暖潮湿的季节, 雨天会经常光顾, 有时甚至会起风暴. 但与之相比, 大部分时间还是万里无云, 风儿有点喧嚣而已.

autumn.description: 高原上的秋日标志着务农日子的结束, 偶尔下雨, 偶尔多云, 有时甚至会下起一场早雪来.

winter.description: 高原上的冬日是严酷的, 持续时间比其他季节都要长一些, 而且基本每天都会下雪. 准备好保暖的衣服吧!

spring.description:
森林里的春天是一个重生的季节,持续三个月, 雨水融化了雪，露出了隐藏在下面的新生命,树木恢复了生机,覆盖着五颜六色的花朵.
  • 阳光光线很好.
  • 空气中的湿度也正好.

summer.description:
森林里的夏天是最温暖的季节,持续三个月。,这是放松和晒太阳的时候,不用担心风暴或下雪.
  • 白天的太阳光线非常充足.
  • 湿度不错.

autumn.description:
森林里的秋天是收获季节,持续三个月. 树木变成金色,草地准备撤退到冬季毯子,天空随着暴风云变暗.
  • 白天的太阳光线正好.
  • 湿度非常高.

winter.description:
森林里的冬天是一个寒冷的季节,持续三个月. 树木失去了叶子,雪覆盖了景观. 寒冷刺骨的风最好通过壁炉周围的舒适聚会来抵消.
  • 白天的太阳光线很差.
  • 湿度不错.

spring.description:
沙漠中的春天是潮湿的季节,持续两个月. 这是一个罕见的补水时间,导致当地的植物群一下子全部开花.
  • 白天阳光非常好.
  • 稍微有些干燥.

summer.description:
沙漠中的夏天是风暴季节,持续四个月,沙尘暴几乎每天都会来破坏你的景观,没有充足住所的城镇;无论是墙壁,山脉还是地下住宅,都可能会毁灭在沙尘暴之中.
  • 白天太阳光亮得吓人.
  • 干燥到让人想喝尿.

autumn.description:
沙漠中的秋天是安静的季节,持续四个月. 天气炎热,但比夏季温和,既没有沙尘暴也没有雨水. 一般来说,这是在夏季沙尘暴中幸存下来后休息的时间.
  • 白天阳光很棒.
  • 比较干燥.

winter.description:
沙漠中的冬天是一个凉爽的季节,持续两个月.微风吹过沙丘,带来比秋天更温和的天气,甚至是偶尔的雪云.
  • 白天阳光正好.
  • 非常干燥的季节.

spring.description:
北极的春天是一个变化的季节,只持续一个月. 虽然高地全年保持积雪,但湖泊周围的低地开始融化,幼草开始萌芽.
  • 白天日照水平正好.
  • 湿度还行.

summer.description:
北极的夏季是一个休息的季节,持续三个月. 天气温和,低地绿草如茵. 这是一种缓解的寒冷,是时候为将来的漫长冬季重新恢复力量了.
  • 白天阳光水平太好了.
  • 湿度有点稀缺.

autumn.description:
凛冬将至,只持续一个月. 虽然暴风雪很少见,但每天都会下雪. 这是在无情的冬天到来之前建造避难所的最后机会,幸运的是这里没有尸鬼,也没有带着龙的婊子.
  • 白天光照并不好.
  • 湿度不错.

winter.description:
北极冬季是一个艰难的季节,持续七个月.虽然没有尸鬼,但是天气非常严峻,寒冷的风和无情的暴风雪使得农业非常困难. 即使在有冬装的情况下冒险也可能不幸结束.
  • 白天跟夜晚差不多.
  • 非常干燥的季节.

windy.description:
咆哮的风和咆哮的大风席卷了整个土地.
  • 正常阳光水平.
  • 湿度稍微增加.

windy_chilly.description:
当寒风吹过陆地时,空气干燥而寒冷.
  • 正常的阳光水平.
  • 不定的湿度水平.
  • 如果不给你的炉民穿防寒衣服的话他们会很难继续工作!

thunderstorm.description:
雷霆开始翻滚,他滚了六个.
  • 白天跟夜晚差不多.
  • 湿度大大增加.
  • 视野半径减小.
  • 没穿特殊服饰的炉民与牧场动物都湿透了.
  • 没有遮挡物的炉民可能会被雷电击中.
  • 地面与树木可能会被雷电击中.

sunny.description:
又一天无尽的阳光和蔚蓝的天空.
  • 阳光水平正好.
  • 湿度稍微降低.

sunny_desert.description:
又一天无尽的阳光和蔚蓝的天空.
  • 阳光水平正好.
  • 湿度降低.

sunny_chilly.description:
这是一个美丽, 阳光灿烂的日子! 即使也有点冷...
  • 几乎没有改变的日照水平
  • 湿度正好.
  • 没有穿衣服的炉民可能会觉得太冷,无法有效工作.

sunny_hot.description:
一个美好而温暖的晴天! 但是温暖过头了, 热量难以忍受...
  • 太阳光线正好.
  • 湿度大幅降低.
  • 暴露在阳光下的炉民可能会觉得太热而无法有效工作.
  • 暴露在阳光下的牧场动物可能会觉得太热而伤了它的心(物理).

sunny_sweltering.description:
An unbearably hot and stale weather has come upon the town this day.
  • Normal sunlight levels.
  • Reduced humidity.
  • Unsheltered hearthlings are sweltering and might get a heatstroke if too exposed to the sun.
  • Unsheltered pasture animals are hurt by the heat.

snow.description:
寒冷,霜冻,太阳冷到决定藏起来.我们可以留在房子里吗?
  • 太阳光照明显降低.
  • 湿度正好.
  • 视野半径稍微减少.
  • 暴露在外的炉民可能会觉得太冷而无法有效工作.
  • 暴露在外的牧场动物可能会被冻伤.

snow_sunny.description:
今天是多么美丽的冬季仙境啊!
  • 日照水平略有下降.
  • 湿度正好.
  • 视野半径略微减少.
  • 暴露在外的炉民可能会觉得天冷而无法有效工作.

snow_early.description:
今年的雪来得早了些...
  • 植物生长速度微减.
  • 不在屋内的炉民因寒冷而不能有效率地工作.

snow_late.description:
今年的雪还没下完...
  • 植物生长速度微减.
  • 不在屋内的炉民因寒冷而不能有效率地工作.
  • 不在屋内的牧场动物会被冻伤.

sandstorm.description:
闭上你的眼睛,捂住你的耳朵;你知道吗?你还是在里面别出来了.
  • 沙云穿过景观,摧毁庄稼并伤害每个人.
  • 一下从白天变成黑天.
  • 一下干成咸鱼.
  • 视野半径略微减少.
  • 暴露在外的牧场动物会受到伤害,炉民在外的话效率会降低.

sandy_day.description:
哪里都是沙尘!气煞俺也!
  • 白天明显变黑了不少.
  • 湿度大大降低.
  • 视野半径会受到小幅削弱.
  • 暴露在外的炉民会因为太热而无法有效工作.
  • 未受到保护的牧场动物会受到伤害.

rain.description:
水!来自天空的水!
  • 几乎等于半个黑夜.
  • 一下湿成王宝强.
  • 视野半径中幅减少.
  • 暴露在外的炉民和牧场动物都变成王宝强了(湿透了)!.

rain_sunny.description:
下雨了,但是太阳正在偷看!
  • 因为太阳偷看,光照并没有降低多少.
  • 湿度急剧增加.
  • 视野半径略微减少.
  • 暴露在外的炉民和牧场动物都会被浸湿.

rain_chilly.description:
这就像是刚出冬的哈尔滨春雨!
  • 跟黑夜区别不大.
  • 非常的湿.
  • 视野下降.
  • 暴露在外的炉民因为太冷而无法有效工作.
  • 暴露在外的牧场动物都湿透了.

lucky.description:
今天,一切都好了不少.
  • 阳光好了不少.
  • 湿度好了不少
  • 炉民的疾病一下子都全好了!就像魔法一样.
  • 炉民的工作状态和效率也要比以前好了不少.
  • 有时会出现神秘的彩虹.

foggy.description:
雾气笼罩着整个大陆,隐藏着无数的神秘色彩.
  • 不死的怪物在雾的笼罩下隐藏起来.
  • 日照水平降低.
  • 湿度急剧增加.
  • 视野半径大大减少.

cloudy.description:
阴云密布的天空,非常适合在门廊上闲逛.
  • 跟黑夜区别不大.
  • 湿度稍微增加.

cloudy_chilly.description:
黑暗的天空和寒冷的微风席卷而来.
  • 跟黑夜差不多.
  • 不定的湿度水平.
  • 暴露在外的炉民会觉得太冷,无法有效工作.

cloudy_cold.description:
云层沉重而黑暗,空气干燥而寒冷.
  • 日照水平大幅度降低.
  • 湿度正好.
  • 暴露在外的炉民会因为太冷而无法工作.
  • 暴露在外的牧场动物会受到伤害.

blizzard.description:
风,雪,冰雹!我的老天爷!
  • 跟黑夜差不多.
  • 湿度稍微降低.
  • 视野半径大幅度减少.
  • 感冒的炉民会受到寒冷所带来的伤害.
  • 未被保护的牧场动物将会受到寒冷所带来的伤害.

snow_early_positive.tooltip: 等了一整年的雪, 冬天终于来了!

snow_early_negative.tooltip: 不敢相信雪下得这么早, 黑暗和寒冷不远了!

snow_late_positive.tooltip: 真高兴能在雪季过完之前再欣赏一天雪!

snow_late_negative.tooltip: 冬天早该结束了, 难以置信已经这种时候了还要下雪...

cloudy_chilly_positive.tooltip: 蓬松的云彩和凉爽的空气! 这是美好的一天.

cloudy_chilly_negative.tooltip: 好像太阳被这些云遮住还不够,今天还很冷!

cloudy_cold_positive.tooltip: 多云和寒冷的日子是最好的!我爱冬天!

cloudy_cold_negative.tooltip: 我们上面是阴暗的阴云,还有一阵刺骨的寒冷...还有什么能比这个更糟？

foggy_chilly_positive.tooltip: 哦!这种模糊是如此的神秘! 脖子后面的这种寒冷的感觉...喜欢!

foggy_chilly_negative.tooltip: 它太冷了,这雾太厚了!那里肯定发生了什么事,我会告诉你的!

rain_chilly_positive.tooltip: 这场冰冷的雨感觉有点清爽,我想知道我们这里是否很快会下雪?

rain_chilly_negative.tooltip: 我无法忍受这种无聊的细雨,冰冷的雨.啊!

sunny_chilly_positive.tooltip: 啊!多么美妙的感觉,没有任何一个冬日会像这样阳光灿烂了!

sunny_chilly_negative.tooltip: 哦,终于再次见到太阳真好了...但是我们能再得到一些温暖吗？

sunny_hot_positive.tooltip: 今天阳光太强了! 可能会有点难受但也让我感觉到我自己如此富有生机！

sunny_hot_negative.tooltip: 为什么它今天还是如此温暖?我不能再忍受这种热了...

sunny_sweltering_positive.tooltip: I know, I know... It is extremely hot. But that means we get to stay more under the shade, right?

sunny_sweltering_negative.tooltip: This is definitely not healthy... Must stay away from the sun... Must stay refreshed...

windy_chilly_positive.tooltip: 没有任何感觉能像温柔而寒冷的北极风吹过你的脸一样令人耳目一新!

windy_chilly_negative.tooltip: 感觉就像脸上有一千张小冰刀划过...嗷！

ate_intolerable.display_name: 吃了一些无法忍受的东西
ate_intolerable.tooltip: 我最近吃了点 [str(foodname)]...我感觉不太好...

dairy_intolerant_ate_dairy.tooltip: 不幸的是 [str(foodname)] 并不适合我的胃...嗷...

nuts_intolerant_ate_nuts.tooltip: 呃...  [str(foodname)] 看上去不错,不过我还是算了

fish_intolerant_ate_fish.tooltip: 我再也不吃 [str(foodname)] 了!再也不!嗷...

ate_lovely.tooltip: 我吃了 [str(foodname)]! 我好高兴!现在给我更多!

dairy_lover_ate_dairy.tooltip: 哈!我很高兴今天能吃到 [str(foodname)] !这绝对是我今天所经历过最好的事!

meat_lover_ate_meat.tooltip: 嗯嗯... [str(foodname)] 太好吃了.我爱吃肉, 任何肉类都喜欢 - 不过这个可以比所有的肉类都好一点点!

vegetable_lover_ate_vegetable.tooltip: 我不敢相信 [str(foodname)] 居然那么好吃.这么好吃的东西怎么可能是从地里长出来的?

fungi_lover_ate_fungi.tooltip: 耶噫!我爱蘑菇! [str(foodname)] 太好吃了!

heliophile.tooltip: 今天是我最喜欢的天气!

chionophile.tooltip: 今天是我最喜欢的天气!

teddy.tooltip: I was visited by the adorable ghost of a very mischievous kitten called Teddy!

merry_time.tooltip: Friends, drinks and a good time! What else could anyone wish for?

morning_after.tooltip: Ugh... Bleh! Everything aches and my head is so heavy. Should not exaggerate so much...

dairy_intolerant_had_dairy.tooltip: I suppose I didn't have any better option other than the [str(drinkname)] that is now making me feel really sick...

alcohol_intolerant_had_alcohol.tooltip: I can't stand alcoholic drinks and taking in that [str(drinkname)] was an awful feeling that I hope to never experience again!

alcohol_lover_had_alcohol.tooltip: Woohoo, make way for this happy hearthling that just enjoyed an amazing [str(drinkname)]! Is there more?

juice_lover_had_juice.tooltip: Yes, I loved that [str(drinkname)]! Juices are the best thing ever, aren't they?

tea_lover_had_tea.tooltip: Hmm... Balance. I feel like this [str(drinkname)] has brought me to a perfect, tranquil state. Nothing can go wrong after this...

dairy_lover_had_dairy.tooltip: I could hug the animal that provided me with that delicious [str(drinkname)]! Hearty and healthy!

had_item_quality_fine.tooltip: There was something particularly special about this [str(drinkname)]. Whoever made it should be congratulated!

had_item_quality_excellent.tooltip: Hmmm, this [str(drinkname)] was incredible! Or should I say... Excellent? I hope there is more for later!

had_item_quality_masterwork.tooltip: I should stop everything and go congratulate whoever made this [str(drinkname)] I had today. It was simply brilliant, the work of a master!

intolerable.tooltip: I've had something intolerable, [str(drinkname)]... I really shouldn't do that anymore, it's unbearable.

unpalatable.tooltip: After finishing this [str(drinkname)] I just can't really think anything other than how bad it was.

raw.tooltip: After a sip or two of the [str(drinkname)] I already knew it wasn't... much.

prepared.tooltip: The effort put into the [str(drinkname)] I just enjoyed is noticeable and can't be denied!

bland.tooltip: I had that [str(drinkname)] and it wasn't particularly tasty... I've had better things before!

tasty.tooltip: Shortly after drinking [str(drinkname)] I already feel like I could drink much more! It was delicious!

lovely.tooltip: Ah, what a wonderful day! Enjoying that lovely [str(drinkname)] has made everything better already.

sated.tooltip: Hmm, I've really enjoyed some beverages recently. I'll be good for a while...

thirsty.tooltip: I haven't had a drink in some time... Could use the refreshment soon.

very_thirsty.tooltip: Uh, I'm so dry... I need to drink something!

good_dream.tooltip: Hmm... Is that a pot of gold? Oh my, I must be dreaming...

bad_dream.tooltip: No... No... Run away, the giant poyo is here! FLY, YOU FOOLS!

levels.description: Gained by levelling up on any job.
levels.6_description: They have six job levels! They have walked the path of a master!
levels.12_description: They now have twelve job levels! More than a master, a grand master!
levels.18_description: They have eighteen job levels! What? That's amazing!
levels.30_description: They've reached thirty job levels, only few and dedicated souls can achieve that...
levels.60_description: They've reached the impressive mark of sixty job levels! That's more experience than many hearthlings combined... Such wisdom!
levels.90_description: They have ninety job levels - this is unbelievable! No hearthling could ever dream of such a feat... Their soul must've been touched by Cid himself!

slayer.100_description: They defeated 100 foes! Was that really necessary?
slayer.250_description: They defeated 250 foes! They can't be stopped!
slayer.600_description: They defeated 600 foes! That has to be a war crime or something...

slayer_item.100_description: It defeated 100 foes! Probably needs some polishing.
slayer_item.250_description: It defeated 250 foes! This should be enough.

goblin_killer.5_description: 他们杀死了五个哥布林!他们去了!又杀了!
goblin_killer.10_description: 他们杀了十个哥布林!他们真的很擅长!
goblin_killer.25_description: They killed 25 goblins! They're really good at it!
goblin_killer.50_description: 他们杀了五十个哥布林!他们从哪找来的那么多哥布林?!
goblin_killer.75_description: They killed 75 goblins! Where are they finding all these goblins?!
goblin_killer.100_description: 他们杀了一百个哥布林!也许他们应该接受治疗,重新审视他们真正该做的事.

goblin_killer_item.5_description: 它杀了五个哥布林!它去了!又杀了!
goblin_killer_item.10_description: 它杀了十个哥布林!它真的很棒!
goblin_killer_item.25_description: It killed 25 goblins! It's really good at it!
goblin_killer_item.50_description: 它杀死了五十个哥布林!这是不可阻挡的,即使是哥布林！
goblin_killer_item.75_description: It killed 75 goblins! It's unstoppable, at least by goblins!
goblin_killer_item.100_description: 它杀了一百个哥布林!它的嗜血最终是否能被满足?

orc_killer.description: Gained by killing followers of the Red Kiln.
orc_killer.5_description: They killed 5 followers of the Red Kiln!
orc_killer.10_description: They killed 10 followers of the Red Kiln! What a challenger!
orc_killer.25_description: They killed 25 followers of the Red Kiln! That requires some skills!
orc_killer.50_description: They killed 50 followers of the Red Kiln! Will they ever stop?
orc_killer.75_description: They killed 75 followers of the Red Kiln! Surely the orcs are convinced by now?
orc_killer.100_description: They killed 100 followers of the Red Kiln! They are worthy of this land!

orc_killer_item.description: Gained by killing followers of the Red Kiln.
orc_killer_item.5_description: It killed 5 followers of the Red Kiln!
orc_killer_item.10_description: It killed 10 followers of the Red Kiln! A fine weapon!
orc_killer_item.25_description: It killed 25 followers of the Red Kiln! That's something!
orc_killer_item.50_description: It killed 50 followers of the Red Kiln! It strikes fear in their hearts!
orc_killer_item.75_description: It killed 75 followers of the Red Kiln! Nothing can stop it!
orc_killer_item.100_description: It killed 100 followers of the Red Kiln! This land is finally safe.

undead_killer.6_description: They killed 6 undead! Is 'killed' even the proper word?
undead_killer.25_description: They killed 25 undead! It feels safer already.
undead_killer.50_description: They killed 50 undead! The long night is over.

undead_killer_item.6_description: It killed 6 undead! What a blessing!
undead_killer_item.15_description: It killed 15 undead! Should be safe to go out tonight.
undead_killer_item.25_description: It killed 25 undead! It definitely did its part!
undead_killer_item.50_description: It killed 50 undead! A beacon of hope!

forest_killer.description: Gained by killing minions of the Wilds.
forest_killer.5_description: They killed 5 minions of the Wilds!
forest_killer.10_description: They killed 10 minions of the Wilds! Entlings, beware!
forest_killer.25_description: They killed 25 minions of the Wilds! Where's the howling now?
forest_killer.50_description: They killed 50 minions of the Wilds! It feels calmer out there...
forest_killer.75_description: They killed 75 minions of the Wilds! Deforestation is a crime!
forest_killer.100_description: They killed 100 minions of the Wilds! Shouldn't nature be your friend?

forest_killer_item.description: Gained by killing minions of the Wilds.
forest_killer_item.5_description: It killed 5 minions of the Wilds!
forest_killer_item.10_description: It killed 10 minions of the Wilds! Firewood, anyone?
forest_killer_item.25_description: It killed 25 minions of the Wilds! A ranger would be proud!
forest_killer_item.50_description: It killed 50 minions of the Wilds! What did nature do to it?
forest_killer_item.75_description: It killed 75 minions of the Wilds! It's time to stop, perhaps?
forest_killer_item.100_description: It killed 100 minions of the Wilds! Nature will never forget this!

titan_killer.5_description: They killed 5 corrupted beings! Such bravery!
titan_killer.10_description: They killed 10 corrupted beings! They stood against darkness!
titan_killer.15_description: They killed 15 corrupted beings! Made a difference during the last battle.
titan_killer.25_description: They killed 25 corrupted beings! They tipped the odds of light against darkness!

titan_killer_item.10_description: It killed 10 corrupted beings! Worthy of a song!
titan_killer_item.15_description: It killed 15 corrupted beings! A weapon of legend!
titan_killer_item.25_description: It killed 25 corrupted beings! This world shall remember its name.

ogre_killer.30_description: They killed 30 ogres! Size really doesn't matter.

ogre_killer_item.12_description: It killed 12 ogres! Maybe it was designed for that?
ogre_killer_item.30_description: It killed 30 ogres! What an epic weapon!

mountain_killer.description: Gained by killing the ogre boss.
mountain_killer.1_description: They've killed the most fearsome ogre!

mountain_killer_item.description: Gained by killing the ogre boss.
mountain_killer_item.1_description: It was used to kill the most fearsome ogre!

varanus_killer.description: Gained by killing varani and such.
varanus_killer.10_description: They killed 10 lizards! Careful with their teeth!
varanus_killer.25_description: They killed 25 lizards! But no dragons yet...
varanus_killer.50_description: They killed 50 lizards! The species is probably endangered!

varanus_killer_item.description: Gained by killing varani and such.
varanus_killer_item.25_description: It killed 25 lizards! Probably needs cleaning!
varanus_killer_item.50_description: It killed 50 lizards! Probably some amphibians too.

zilla_killer.description: Gained by killing the lizard boss.
zilla_killer.1_description: They've killed the most fearsome lizard!

zilla_killer_item.description: Gained by killing the lizard boss.
zilla_killer_item.1_description: It was used to kill the most fearsome lizard!

leader_killer.3_description: They killed 3 enemy leaders! Cut the serpent's head!
leader_killer.5_description: They killed 5 enemy leaders! Enemies won't settle here...
leader_killer.10_description: They killed 10 enemy leaders! Chaos in their ranks!

leader_killer_item.5_description: It killed 5 enemy leaders! They'll think twice now...
leader_killer_item.10_description: It killed 10 enemy leaders! It loves anarchy!

ogo_killer.description: Gained by killing the goblin boss.
ogo_killer.1_description: They've killed the most fearsome goblin!

ogo_killer_item.description: Gained by killing the goblin boss.
ogo_killer_item.1_description: It was used to kill the most fearsome goblin!

warchief_killer.description: Gained by defeating the orc boss.
warchief_killer.1_description: They've bested the most fearsome orc in combat!

warchief_killer_item.description: Gained by defeating the orc boss.
warchief_killer_item.1_description: It was used to best the most fearsome orc in combat!

hunter.30_description: They hunted 30 wild animals! Poor animals...
hunter.75_description: They hunted 75 wild animals! That's food for months!
hunter.150_description: They hunted 150 wild animals! Is it an obsession?
hunter.300_description: They hunted 300 wild animals! Someone really loves barbecue!
hunter.600_description: They hunted 600 wild animals! Be careful to not cause an extinction!

hunter_item.30_description: It hunted 30 wild animals! It has just started!
hunter_item.75_description: It hunted 75 wild animals! A true hunting weapon!
hunter_item.150_description: It hunted 150 wild animals! No forest is safe...
hunter_item.300_description: It hunted 300 wild animals! That's a lot of jerky.
hunter_item.600_description: It hunted 600 wild animals! Vegetarians must hate it!

defender.description: 通过获得杀戮助攻获得(直接参与战斗或与被杀死的敌人接近).
defender.25_description: They defended the town from 25 enemies!
defender.50_description: 他们在五十个敌人的手中保护城镇!
defender.100_description: 他们在一百个敌人的手中保护了城镇!终于要结束了吗?
defender.500_description: 他们在五百个敌人的手中保护城镇!多么令人难以置信的城镇对抗!
defender.1000_description: 他们在一千个敌人的手中保护城镇!也许有必要采取更具外交性的手段了.

prolific_crafter.description: 通过制作很多物品获得.
prolific_crafter.100_description: 他们创造了一百个物品!
prolific_crafter.200_description: 他们创造了两百个物品!
prolific_crafter.500_description: 他们创造了五百个物品!也许他们需要一些助手.
prolific_crafter.1000_description: 他们创造了一千个物品!排队取物的人最好能有一些养老金.

excellent_crafter.description: 通过制作优质的物品(精细还不够,必须要是杰作)获得.
excellent_crafter.10_description: 他们制作了十件优秀的商品!
excellent_crafter.25_description: 他们制作了二十五件优秀的商品!
excellent_crafter.100_description: 他们制作了一百个优秀的商品!

master_crafter.description: 通过制作大师品质的物品获得.
master_crafter.1_description: 他们制作了大师作品!惊人!
master_crafter.10_description: 他们制作了十个大师作品!难以置信!
master_crafter.25_description: They crafted 25 masterwork quality items! Who knew that was even possible?

starving.description: 通过花费大量时间挨饿来获得
starving.1_description: 他们花了四个小时来挨饿!
starving.2_description: 他们饿了两天,仍然屹立!
starving.3_description: 他们已经饿了10天了! 也许食物采集的事情应该稍微优先考虑.

incapacitated.description: 通过多次失去行动能力获得.
incapacitated.1_description: 他们被击倒并起身然后被再次击倒.
incapacitated.2_description: 他们已经被击倒五次了!是否有人能杀死他们?
incapacitated.4_description: They've been incapacitated 4 times! Is it even possible to kill them?
incapacitated.8_description: They've been incapacitated 8 times! Will they ever learn to avoid life-threatening situations?
incapacitated.12_description: They've been incapacitated 12 times! For how long can they trick death like this?
incapacitated.20_description: They've been incapacitated 20 times! It is unbelievable how lucky (or foolish) they are.

swimming.description: Gained by spending a lot of time swimming.
swimming.1_description: They've spent a whole day swimming!
swimming.2_description: They've spent three whole days swimming! They must love water.
swimming.3_description: They've spent a whole month swimming! Such energy!
swimming.4_description: They've spent three months swimming! What?!
swimming.5_description: They've spent half a year swimming! I bet the other half was sleeping...

sweet_energy.description: Gained by eating a lot of sweet foods!
sweet_energy.1_description: They have eaten sweet foods 10 times! Still healthy enough, probably.
sweet_energy.2_description: They have eaten sweet foods 25 times! Who can resist some candy?
sweet_energy.3_description: They have eaten sweet foods 50 times! They really like it!
sweet_energy.4_description: They have eaten sweet foods 100 times! That's a lot, watch out for your sugar levels!
sweet_energy.5_description: They have eaten sweet foods 200 times! That's probably not healthy...
sweet_energy.6_description: They have eaten sweet foods 500 times! Did they even manage to sleep lately?

drunk.description: Gained by spending a lot of time quite woozy because of alcoholic drinks.
drunk.1_description: They've been more there than here for six days! That's a lot!
drunk.2_description: They've spent twelve entire days feeling quite, quite light-headed!
drunk.3_description: They've been drinking for twenty entire days. Are they even working?
drunk.4_description: They've been merry for forty-five days. That's a lot of time to think...
drunk.5_description: They've spent an entire year drinking. Honestly, we should just give them an award!

morning_after.description: Gained by exaggerating a bit too much when drinking...
morning_after.1_description: They did it! No one is perfect, everyone does it eventually... They've had too many drinks and will enjoy a nice morning after...
morning_after.2_description: They have passed the point and had a lot of drinks... Six times already! Perhaps they want some help?
morning_after.3_description: They have had a bad morning after like eighteen times... They probably enjoy it somehow!
morning_after.4_description: They have been there and back again sixty times! Live and die by the bottle, they say...

none.description: 这个地点以下的探测区内都没有矿.

some.description: 这个地点以下的探测区内有一些矿, 但可能会很深.

lots.description: 这个地点以下的探测区内有许多矿, 或者这些矿离地表很近.

tons.description: 你简直坐在金矿上! (也有可能是其他矿.)

none.description: 要么是没有野生动物, 要么是已经建了建筑了. 这片区域里放狩猎区很不合适.

little.description: 这片区域已被开发. 试着种点树来*打扮*一下. 在这片区域内放狩猎区则效率会大打折扣.

some.description: 这片区域没被怎么开发过, 但也不会吸引太多动物. 多种几棵大型植物或许会有帮助. 这片区域内狩猎区效率中等.

lots.description: 这片区域相当原始, 可以吸引许多动物. 这片区域内的狩猎区效率略有提升.

tons.description: 名副其实的伊甸园! 这片区域内放狩猎区效率是最高的!

big_game.name: 大野味
big_game.description: 从大型动物身上可以获得大块生肉, 肉干, 皮毛, 还有其他有用的东西

rabid_bear.description: 这头奇怪的动物有点不对劲...

wolf_trainer.description: Whips beasts into a dangerous frenzy

sapper.description: Voluntary sapper. Wants to destroy things!

varanus.description: Taken as an egg to be a war machine

miniboss.description: Seeker of revenge, forever loyal to Ogo!

epic_undead_bow.description: Brings poisoned arrows from the grave...

allow_hunting.description: 这个炉民会忽略任何他所看到的野外生物,点击以允许让他狩猎!

avoid_hunting.description: 这个疯狂的炉民会追捕他看到的任何野生动物,点击来禁止!

prepare_mega_pumpkin_soup.description: 准备一块石头和一捆柴火, 厨师能把这个巨型蔬菜做成美味的汤!

stomp_mega_cotton_pet_bed.description: 让一名工人用榔头使劲砸这朵巨型棉花, 直到适合给小动物睡觉.

prepare_mega_watermelon_juice.description: 雕出一个洞, 把里面搅一下, 厨师能把这个巨型水果变成很好吃的果汁!

add_thatch_to_bed.description: 通过添加一些茅草来让这张床变得更舒适!

cheese_vat_fill.description: 命令厨师往这个奶酪桶中倒入一种凝结的混合物,开始生产奶酪!

cheese_vat_drain.description: 命令厨师去除剩余的乳质并处理凝乳,形成新鲜的奶酪!

carve_furniture.description: 命令木匠将这块老木头改造成新的时尚!

sculpt_block.description: 命令一名工人将这块巨石凿成一块漂亮而有用的块,然后由石匠带回家进行使用!

sculpt_statue.description: 命令石匠用他们最拿手的技能,将这块石头改造成美丽的东西！

release_fish.description: 让这些小动物自由!不过得确保他们回到的是水中...

open_door.description: Open this door and leave it, everyone will be able to go through!

close_door.description: Close this door, preventing animals or creatures from going through.

fermenting_vat_fill.description: Order the Cook or Herbalist to fill this fermenting vat with wort to start brewing! Wort is crafted by the Cook.

build_well.description: Order the construction of this water well. A water well can't be undeployed or moved and can only be removed by destroying it.

build_well_roof.description: Use a crafted Water Well Roof of the same kind to add a fancy roof to make your citizens happier and your water always fresh!

fermenting_vat_gruit.description: Order the Cook or Herbalist to add gruit to the ale, letting it bitter and turn into beer, a more refined drink. Gruit is crafted by the Herbalist.

slaughter.description: 杀掉野生动物来获取资源.

toggle_training_off.description: 这个炉民当前允许训练. 点击以禁止!

toggle_training_on.description: 这个炉民当前被禁止训练. 点击以允许!

enable_auto_harvest.description: 当可以采集就启用当前可再生资源的自动采集.

disable_auto_harvest.description: 禁用当前可再生资源的自动采集.

one_handed_footman.description: 该步兵当前会偏好选择一样主武器再持一面盾. 点击以更改偏好设定!

two_handed_footman.description: 该步兵当前会偏好选择一把双手武器. 点击以更改偏好设定!

dual_wield_footman.description: 该步兵当前会偏好选择一把主手武器和一把副手武器. 点击以更改偏好设定!

one_handed_knight.description: 该骑士当前会偏好选择一样主武器再持一面盾. 点击以更改偏好设定!

two_handed_knight.description: 该骑士当前会偏好选择使用一把双手武器. 点击以更改偏好设定!

bow_archer.description: 该弓箭手当前会偏好选择弓. 点击以更改偏好设定!

crossbow_archer.description: 该弓箭手当前会偏好选择弩. 点击以更改偏好设定!

manage_parties.description: 管理军队的巡逻点旗帜与守备区域(还未实装).

remove_patrol_banner.description: 从此路线开始删除选定的巡逻路线.

move_patrol_banner.description: 将选定的巡逻路线移动,修改路线

slow_bolts.description: Currently using spiky bolts, which slows enemy movement speed. Click to swap between bolt types.

default_bolts.description: Using normal bolts. Click to swap to a different bolt type

require_low_fuel.description: Lower Grade Fuel is required to bring this workshop back to action!

require_high_fuel.description: Higher Grade Fuel is required to bring this workshop back to action!

require_fuel.description: Good Grade Fuel is required to bring this workshop back to action!

require_common_fuel.description: Any Common Fuel can be used to bring this workshop back to action!

require_any_fuel.description: Any Fuel can be used to bring this workshop back to action!

capture_fish.description: Order the Trapper to capture this fish instead of harvesting it. A captured fish will remain contained in a small crate that can be placed somewhere else for release.

hamstrung.description: 因关键部位受伤而移动变慢.

out_of_balance.description: 由于失去平衡而伤害减少.

lightweight_gear.description: 炉民穿着轻型装备, 行动更为敏捷!

fracture.description: 由于受到破片伤害而降低护甲.

open_wounds.description: 40分钟内每10分钟减少6点生命值.

shaken.description: 勇气降低, 更容易失去信心临阵逃跑.

major_fracture.description: 由于受到破片伤害而护甲大幅降低.

minor_fracture.description: 由于受到破片伤害而护甲略有下降.

major_hamstrung.description: 因关键部位受伤而移动大幅变慢.

minor_hamstrung.description: 因关键部位受伤而移动速度略有下降.

minor_open_wounds.description: 40分钟内每10分钟减少3点生命值.

major_open_wounds.description: 40分钟内每10分钟减少10点生命值.

minor_out_of_balance.description: 由于失去平衡而伤害稍微减少.

major_out_of_balance.description: 由于失去平衡而伤害大幅减少.

major_shaken.description: 勇气大幅降低, 极容易失去信心临阵逃跑.

minor_shaken.description: 勇气稍微降低, 可能会失去信心临阵逃跑.

ice_trap.description: 无法移动! 被冰冻陷阱吓呆了!

decoy.description: 被骚扰陷阱分散了注意力!

not_in_water.description: 这个动物还不适应陆地... 会有些不好的影响!

holiday_cheer.description: 喔! 炉民正在享受节日的氛围, 他们同情心与速度略微增加了!

thorns.description: 这位炉民可以给攻击他的敌人造成伤害.

upset_belly.description: 非常不舒服.速度,效率和意志力降低.

lovely_meal.description: 吃得好才有动力!效率和意志力大幅度提高.

armor_light.description: 这个炉民装备轻巧,速度提高但勇气和威胁降低.

armor_medium.description: 这个炉民穿着中型盔甲,并且增加了勇气,但速度稍微降低了.

armor_heavy.description: 这个炉民装甲很重,增加了勇气和威胁但速度却降低了.

shield_heavy.description: 防御总体上增加但速度略有下降.

chilly_debuff.description: 这里有点冷...可能不会努力工作!

cold_debuff.description: 今天真的很冷!我应该找个有屋顶的地方!

animal_cold_debuff.description:
宝贝儿,外面很冷.
  • 如果没有遮挡,这种动物会随着时间的推移受到伤害.

freezing_debuff.description:
我在外面会结冰的!我需要温暖!快!
  • 如果炉民暴露在外,这种受伤会随着时间的推移而增加,最低可达到健康的40％.

animal_freezing_debuff.description:
这种动物绝对应该受到庇护...
  • 如果没有受到保护,这种动物会随着时间的推移受到伤害.

hot_debuff.description: 工作让我出了太多的汗,我也许需要一些茶点!

animal_hot_debuff.description:
即使对于动物来说,太热也会受到惩罚!
  • 如果太热的话,这种动物会随着时间的推移而受到伤害.

sweltering_debuff.description:
I'm sweltering... Should stay indoors or have something refreshing to drink...
  • This hearthling has an increasing chance of getting a sunstroke the longer they stay exposed to the heat.
  • Wearing some sort of head protection like hats, helmets or hoods will prevent heatstrokes.

animal_sweltering_debuff.description:
This heat is unbearable for animals!
  • This animal will reproduce much slower.
  • This animal won't produce as much.

soaked_debuff.description: 我真的很湿,我的衣服滴水了!

animal_soaked_debuff.description: 即使是动物也不喜欢这种潮湿.

sunstroke_debuff.description:
那么的温暖...眩晕...我需要清凉!现在!
  • 这位炉民会因为时间推移而受到伤害.

freezing_water_debuff.description:
吼哇!这水很冷,我不应该在这里!
  • 这位炉民在水中会随着时间的推移受到10％的健康损害.

chilly_resist_buff.description: 这个炉民可以抵御有点冷的天气.

cold_resist_buff.description: 这个炉民可以抵御寒冷天气.

freezing_resist_buff.description: 这个炉民可以抵御"冷出屎"天气

hot_resist_buff.description: 避免阳光和高气流使这个炉民受到热天气的影响.

sweltering_resist_buff.description: Efficient protection against the sun and blazing winds will keep this hearthling safe from the heat of extremely hot weather.

refreshed_buff.description: 这令人耳目一新!应保持新鲜一段时间.

warmed_buff.description: 我能感受到温暖,而且非常舒适!应该能感觉好一阵子.

chilly_debuff_npc.description: Speed and Damage are slightly reduced.

cold_debuff_npc.description: Speed, Willpower and Damage are somewhat reduced.

freezing_debuff_npc.description: Speed, Willpower and Damage are severely reduced.

compassionate_shepherd_buff.description: 由富有同情心的牧羊人照顾.这种动物会随着时间的推移而愈合,产生更多的资源,并且繁殖更快.

warm_belly.description:
里面一切的都温暖而模糊,很美味!意志力增强.
  • 这个炉民有一段时间都能不受寒冷和寒冷天气的影响.

refreshed_belly.description:
这令人耳目一新,我感觉很爽!效率增加.
  • 这个炉民有一段时间都不会受炎热天气的影响.

sweet_energy.description: 呜!糖份冲刺!勤奋增加,速度和制作速度略有提高!

light_headed.description:
Having a merry time! Maybe a bit too much... Oh, well. Courage is increased. Diligence, Willpower, Speed and Stamina are slightly decreased.
  • Crafting takes longer and has less chances of producing high quality items
  • This hearthling is less menacing to enemies
  • This hearthling will want to engage in conversations and sleep a lot more than usual

quite_woozy.description:
Is the world spinning or is it just me? Courage is greatly increased. Diligence, Willpower, Speed and Stamina are decreased.
  • Crafting takes longer and has less chances of producing high quality items
  • This hearthling is much less menacing to enemies
  • This hearthling will want to engage in a lot more conversations
  • This hearthling will have the 'The Morning after...' effect applied when this effect expires

morning_after.description:
Ouch... Next time I shouldn't exaggerate so much! Diligence, Willpower and Stamina are greatly reduced.
  • Crafting takes longer
  • This hearthling will not be willing to start conversations

merry_time.description: The hearthling's mood is greatly increased.

fruity_flavors.description:
Enjoyed a delicious fruit beverage! Willpower and Compassion are increased.
  • Crafting is slightly faster

harmony_minor.description:
Hmm... I feel a gentle peace inside. Diligence and Curiosity are slightly increased.
  • Crafting is a little slower but with slightly increased quality
  • Experience gain is slightly increased

harmony.description:
Perfectly balanced, as all things should be. Diligence and Curiosity are increased.
  • Crafting is somewhat slower but with quite increased quality
  • Experience gain is increased

harmony_major.description:
Interior tranquility is the key to understanding oneself. Diligence and Curiosity are quite increased.
  • Crafting is quite slower but with incredibly increased quality
  • Experience gain is greatly increased

thirsty.description: I could probably use something to drink...

very_thirsty.description: My mouth is dry! I really need something to drink!

lovely_drink.description: Nothing more revigorating than having your favorite drink! Stamina and Compassion fairly increased.

toxin_resist.description: This hearthling is protected against weak poisons, toxins and infections.

minor_poison.description:
A weak, non-lethal poison. Will last some hours. Muscle and Willpower are fairly reduced.
  • Losing 5% of their health points every 30 minutes
  • This poison will only damage them down to 75% of their total health

poison.description:
A non-lethal but dangerous poison. Might last a day or so. Muscle and Willpower are reduced.
  • Losing 5% of their health points every 20 minutes
  • This poison will damage them down to only 30% of their total health

major_poison.description:
A tough, lethal poison. Can last a couple of days. Muscle and Willpower are greatly reduced.
  • Losing 5% of their health points every 10 minutes
  • This poison can damage them until they die and require constant medical attention

toxin_sleeping.description: This is a weak toxin. It sticks for longer the more it is applied and will rapidly reduce its target's consciousness, putting them to sleep.

spring_flavors.description:
Ahh! Nothing like cool and fresh water straight from the source! Diligence and Compassion are increased.
  • Crafting has a slightly increased quality chance
  • Experience gain is slightly increased

military_expedition.description: 这些炉民们在开始几天可能缺乏食物只能睡在冰冷的地面, 真实... 但估计几天后那些讨厌的狼群和哥布林就要吃苦头了!
military_expedition.tooltip: 专注军事力量的开局物资, 适合那些把安全感放在第一位的.

noble_entourage.description: 不是每个人能吃到鹿肉的, 也不是每个人都能睡到床的... 那又如何? 它们本来就不是雨露均沾的, 只有VIP炉民才有权享受 - 至少他们是这样说的 - 但这足以让这一小队人都乖乖跟着出发探险.
noble_entourage.tooltip: 高价值物品和职业的物资, 是一个奇怪特别的开局.

dairy_intolerance_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] 对乳制品特别敏感,他的肚子可能跟乳制品有仇...

fish_intolerance_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] 对鱼和海鲜特别敏感,他的肚子可能跟鱼有仇...

nuts_intolerance_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] 前世是僵尸转世,今世最讨厌的便是挡路的坚果和坚硬的种子!

dairy_love_trait.description: 总所周知 [name(i18n_data.entity)] 喜欢乳制品,这已经不是什么秘密了.如果可以的话,他愿意吃一辈子.

vegetable_love_trait.description: 总所周知 [name(i18n_data.entity)] 喜欢蔬菜,这已经不是什么秘密了.如果可以的话,他愿意吃一辈子.

meat_love_trait.description: 总所周知 [name(i18n_data.entity)] 喜欢吃肉,这已经不是什么秘密了.如果可以的话,他愿意吃一辈子.

fungi_love_trait.description: 最爱蘑菇的炉民就是 [name(i18n_data.entity)] 了,他非常喜欢吃蘑菇,因为传闻蘑菇可以让他变成蘑菇头!

carnivore_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] 只爱吃动物!特别是辣酱.但是,他们真的不喜欢吃蔬菜.

herbivore_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] 是所有动物的朋友!但是对植物就不一样了,他们真的不喜欢吃肉,爱吃菜.

chionophile_trait.description: 没人知道这个词.然而,每个人都知道 [name(i18n_data.entity)] 有多喜欢下雪的日子!

heliophile_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] 喜欢赞美太阳!它的光线和热量是他们最喜欢的东西,让他们真的很开心.

alcohol_intolerance_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] has a strong dislike for alcoholic beverages. These just don't get along with their belly.

alcohol_love_trait.description: It is no secret how much [name(i18n_data.entity)] loves all types of alcoholic beverages. They always appreciate drinking these more than anything else, if possible.

juice_love_trait.description: It is no secret how much [name(i18n_data.entity)] loves juices. They always appreciate drinking them more than anything else, if possible.

tea_love_trait.description: It is no secret how much [name(i18n_data.entity)] loves all sorts of tea and infusions. They always appreciate drinking them more than anything else, if possible.

light_sleeper_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] is famous for waking up alongside the poyos - or earlier. They will sleep less than most hearthlings but also get tired sooner.

sleepyhead_trait.description: Waking up [name(i18n_data.entity)] can be a challenge. They love sleeping so much that they'll probably sleep a bit more than they should...

level_1_data.training_perk_description: 步兵可以使用假人训练至3级并会增加2格训练装备上限

level_3_data.training_complete_description: 这个步兵已经完成了他的战斗训练,现在想寻找新的机会,比如成为一个骑士!

level_1_data.training_perk_description: 弓箭手可以使用假人训练至3级并会增加1格训练装备上限

level_2_data.xbow_proficiency_description: 射手能够用弩向敌人射出强力箭

archer_description.description: 后排战斗单位, 可以使用诸如弓或弩的远程武器, 并可以换用一系列具有阻碍性质的箭或弩箭来攻击敌人.

level_1_data.hunting_perk_description: 北方联盟的弓箭手自然善于动物追踪,可以捕猎动物和其他资源.

level_1_data.training_perk_description: 牧师可以用牧羊人养的羊咩咩来练习他们的治愈魔法姿势, 获得经验直至3级

cleric_description.description: 战地治疗师, 可以运用圣魔法来治疗伤口, 同时还能通过气息和增益来强化友军.

level_1_data.training_perk_description: 骑士可以使用假人训练至3级并会增加1格训练装备上限
level_1_data.perk_000_description: Increases Stamina, Courage, and draws attention from monsters. Greater fortitude allows the Knight to feel more comfortable in armor, also slightly increasing their Speed.

knight_description.description: 防御型战士, 擅长保护队友, 与敌人周旋, 把恐惧烙印在敌人的心底!

level_3_data.perk_000_description: The Stamina and Courage bonuses are increased greatly. The Speed bonus is doubled.

knight_horn.description: To strike fear, rally your fellow hearthlings or protect the little ones.

health_1_buff.description: The knight becomes more menacing to enemies, drawing their attention in combat. They also get a health, speed and stamina bonus to keep up.

almond_transmute_recipe.flavor: Only a skilled hand can choose the best nuts, but the rest are destroyed in the process.

daisy_transmute_recipe.description: 从草药中分离出种子. 雏菊种植后会传播开来.
daisy_transmute_recipe.flavor: 只有熟练的手才能收获较弱的种子,否则草药在此过程中会丢失.

cotton_transmute_recipe.flavor: Only a skilled hand can harvest the weaker seeds, but the fiber is destroyed in the process.

sunflower_transmute_recipe.flavor: Sunflower seeds are oleaginous seeds and can be used to make oil.

dwarfsbeard_transmute_recipe.flavor: Only a skilled hand can harvest the weaker seeds, but the fiber is destroyed in the process.

cherry_bush_transmute_recipe.flavor: Only a skilled hand can harvest the weaker seeds, but the fruit is lost in the process.

moonbell_transmute_recipe.flavor: 只有老手才能把脆弱的种子分离出来, 但这过程中草药则会被损坏.

sugarbell_transmute_recipe.flavor: Only a skilled hand can harvest the weaker seeds, but the sugarbells are lost in the process.

marblesprout_transmute_recipe.flavor: 只有老手才能把脆弱的种子分离出来, 但这过程中花朵则会被损坏.

marblesprout_drying_recipe.description: 将云石蕊晒干做成一块用于装饰的大理石.

algae_drying_recipe.description: 晒干压成片状的藻类, 可以当作草药用.

fertilizer_recipe.description: 有经验的农民用来稍稍提升作物产出质量的东西.

fertilizer_upgrade_recipe.description: 有经验的农民用来提升作物产出质量的东西.

fertilizer_upgrade_2_recipe.description: 有经验的农民用来大大提升作物产出质量的东西.

fertilizer_megacrop_recipe.description: 这种复杂的肥料给不了你最好的品质, 但它会大大增加巨型作物产出的概率!

plant_glass.description: 让家看上去更舒适的东西.
plant_glass.flavor: 字面上精心挑选的花朵将放在这个花瓶里.有些花朵可能比其他花朵更引人注目*眨眼, 眨眼*.

gruit_recipe.description: A bundle of bitter herbs and seasonings. This traditional recipe uses juniper berries.
gruit_recipe.flavor: The Cook or Herbalist can add it to a Fermentation Vat with Ale to make beer

rc_gruit_recipe.description: A bundle of bitter herbs and seasonings. Gruit is often made with wax plants in the desert.
rc_gruit_recipe.flavor: The Cook or Herbalist can add it to a Fermentation Vat with Ale to make beer

na_gruit_recipe.description: A bundle of bitter herbs and seasonings. The northerners use pine cones for its flavor.
na_gruit_recipe.flavor: The Cook or Herbalist can add it to a Fermentation Vat with Ale to make beer

herbalist_hood.description: 沙漠地区草药师的保护性头套.

level_2_data.taming_local_flora_description: 草药学家已经掌握了该地区的足够知识,以学习如何种植当地植物
level_2_data.collaborative_insight_description: 草药师现在足够熟练地使用由其他工匠创造的材料,并且能够成为牧师了

level_5_data.item_proficiency_2_description: 草药师的医疗实力使治疗道具的有效性提高了100％.

level_6_data.power_medic_3_description: 草药师现在一次最多可以照顾6个炉民了.

herbalist_description.description: 治疗者, 草药师能制作和使用汤剂, 绷带和治疗药水，同时也和植物, 种子和其他可采集的果子打交道.

herbalist_mortar_pewter.description: 一种优等金属砂浆和杵,用于提高草药师的速度.

bronze_crossbow_recipe.description: 虽然射速慢, 但是把强力的远程武器, 能有效地破坏敌人护甲.

steel_crossbow_recipe.description: 不快但很强势, 能穿透护甲.

legendary_mace_recipe.flavor: 设计出来便是为了粉碎一切装甲

water_gate_recipe.description: 能开关的6面闸, 可以控制流体流向.

water_pump_recipe.description: 水泵可以把水从放置高度抽起来, 并从上轴处释放.
water_pump_recipe.flavor: 你可以叠高水泵来把水送到更高的地方去!

water_gate_greater_recipe.description: 更大更坚固的水闸, 可以控制水流.

axle_horizontal_recipe.description: 能向前传递机械能的旋转轮轴.

axle_vertical_recipe.description: 能竖直传递机械能的旋转轮轴.

axle_gear_box_recipe.description: 让你可以随意调整机械能输出方向的设备.
axle_gear_box_recipe.flavor: 可以在建筑时放至墙上 - 就像门窗.

bronze_portcullis_large_recipe.description: Useful for fortifying town entrypoints. This is a slightly larger alternative to the Bronze Portcullis.

portcullis_valor_large_recipe.description: For times when only the strongest door will do. This is a slightly larger alternative to the Castle Portcullis.

engineer_description.description: 工程师是发明创造和制作防御工事的大师, 还能修复设施, 设计机械来给其他行业造福.

bone_clay_recipe.description: 用来制作瓷器或者美丽的装饰陶器的必需品.

bone_clay_x3_recipe.description: 用来制作瓷器或者美丽的装饰陶器的必需品.
bone_clay_x3_recipe.flavor: 有了正确的配比和娴熟的技术后, 陶艺师掌握了制作骨泥更有效率的方法

clay_animal_door_recipe.description: A large door for animal shelters, it can be closed by a shepherd. When closed, only hearthlings may go through!

clay_animal_door_small_recipe.description: A small door for animal shelters, it can be closed by a shepherd.
clay_animal_door_small_recipe.flavor: When placed on ground level, the two tiles of dirt underneath it must be dug out for it to work!

clay_bed_crude_recipe.description: 没力气干活了闭上眼睛的合适场所.
clay_bed_crude_recipe.flavor: '像个陶罐, 睡觉用的!' - 克劳伦斯, 临时售货员

clay_bed_recipe.flavor: 干草可以通过采集草丛, 采集风滚草之类的植物, 或者挖掘草地地层来获得

clay_training_dummy_recipe.description: 近战士兵可以通过和这个友好的家伙练手来获得经验.

clay_training_target_recipe.description: 远程士兵可以以它为靶子练习来获得经验.

clay_sword_recipe.description: 可以把炉民转职成步兵.
clay_sword_recipe.flavor: 很容易坏, 应该用不了多长时间... 对吧?

porcelain_fence_bar_double_recipe.description: 做一段双倍长的陶瓷墙.

porcelain_fence_gate_recipe.flavor: 这扇漂亮的门可以防止炉民绕远路

porcelain_wall_lamp_recipe.description: 用于照亮一块美丽的地方.

porcelain_chair_recipe.description: 简单却不失高雅的家具.

porcelain_comfy_bed_recipe.description: 给那些即使睡着了也想优雅的人准备的.

porcelain_dining_table_recipe.description: 做一张能在上面吃东西的陶瓷桌子.
porcelain_dining_table_recipe.flavor: 上面的桌布是为了能让你看清陶瓷餐具

porcelain_display_cabinet_recipe.description: 一个展示上瓷之前所有无聊陶土物件的柜子!

porcelain_dresser_recipe.description: 和这家具一起活得奢侈.
porcelain_dresser_recipe.flavor: 有这梳妆台谁还用得着梳妆啊?

porcelain_floor_tile_recipe.description: 给你的炉民做一块陶瓷地砖.

porcelain_jar_of_feathers_recipe.description: 瓷和布匹做成的华丽大羽毛.

porcelain_shelf_recipe.description: 装饰品能放在架子上面.

porcelain_table_recipe.description: 即使过着奢侈的生活, 有人可能还是喜欢吃独食.

porcelain_urn_tall_recipe.description: 精心绘画过的美丽陶瓷.

porcelain_wall_tile_blue_recipe.description: 需要高超的手艺让它们契合.

simple_bed_pet_recipe.description: 一个给炉民的宠物睡觉的, 好一点的地方.
simple_bed_pet_recipe.flavor: 宠物永远会选择离主人床位最近的一张床睡觉!

clay_comfy_bed_pet_recipe.description: 让动物们也有个更舒适的睡眠.
clay_comfy_bed_pet_recipe.flavor: 宠物永远会选择离主人床位最近的一张床睡觉!

porcelain_bed_pet_recipe.description: 在这张床上睡觉小动物们肯定会开心的!
porcelain_bed_pet_recipe.flavor: 宠物永远会选择离主人床位最近的一张床睡觉!

fuel_holder_large_clay_recipe.description: 建造一个可靠的存储棚,可以随时储存18捆的木柴

food_trough_clay_recipe.description: 牧人用来在牧场上为动物提供食物的槽.

level_1_data.transform_perk_description: 陶艺师将付出耐心和奉献精神,将一些粘土块塑造成漂亮的艺术品.

level_4_data.ornate_perk_description: 陶艺师对粘土的研究和工作使他们获得足够的知识来创造有价值的骨头粘土.

stone_animal_door_small_recipe.flavor: When placed on ground level, the two tiles of dirt underneath it must be dug out for it to work!

legendary_headpiece_recipe.description: 月恒星升上强力而致命的锤头.

weaver_spindle_steel_recipe.description: 制作一套优雅的镀银针,以提高裁缝的制作速度.

worker_axe_iron_recipe.description: 一把可以稍微提高工人砍树效率的工具.

worker_axe_steel_recipe.description: 一把可以大大提高工人砍树效率的工具.

worker_hammer_iron_recipe.description: 一把可以稍微提高工人建造效率的工具.

worker_hammer_steel_recipe.description: 一把可以大大提高工人建造效率的工具.

mining_pick_iron_recipe.flavor: 该工具还能提高优质资源获得的几率

mining_pick_steel_recipe.description: 一把可以大大提高工人挖掘效率的工具.
mining_pick_steel_recipe.flavor: 该工具还能提高优质资源获得的几率

worker_tools_iron_recipe.description: 为工人制作一套铁制工具.
worker_tools_iron_recipe.flavor: 略微提高挖掘出更优质资源的可能性,并在砍伐,采矿和建筑时略微提高其工作速度.

worker_tools_steel_recipe.description: 为工人制作一套钢铁工具.
worker_tools_steel_recipe.flavor: 提高挖掘出更优质资源的可能性,并在砍伐,采矿和建筑时大幅度提高其工作速度.

gold_ingot_from_coins_recipe.description: 将100枚金币融合在一起,形成一个金块

gold_coins_from_ingot_recipe.description: 将金块熔化成金币,可用于交易!

gold_coins_from_flakes_recipe.description: 将金片熔化成可用于交易的金币!

blacksmith_fuel_oven_recipe.description: 用于精炼加工特定原材料, 例如木头和煤炭.
blacksmith_fuel_oven_recipe.flavor: 烈火需要纯净的燃料. 只有刻苦才能制得. -卢肯· 范刘斯, 点火师

blacksmith_crucible_recipe.description: 可用于熔化加工金属或制作合金.
blacksmith_crucible_recipe.flavor: 火和石头可以给你金属, 金属加金属会给你... 嗯, 更多金属. -卢肯· 范刘斯, 点火师

blacksmith_forge_advanced_recipe.flavor: 是金子不一定会闪光; 但如果它闪了, 就会被送到炉子里融化掉. -卢肯· 范刘斯, 点火师

blacksmith_workbench_advanced_recipe.description: 这块不可思议的砧可以保持金属的温度, 让它们可以锻成更精细厉害的工艺品.
blacksmith_workbench_advanced_recipe.flavor: 加热和敲击的平衡至关重要. 掌握不好就两个放一起吧. -卢肯· 范刘斯, 点火师

charcoal_recipe.description: 在缺乏氧气的情况下加热木头便得到了木炭, 优质燃料.
charcoal_recipe.flavor: 专家称之为'缓慢高温裂解'. 而我叫它大火堆!

coke_recipe.description: 加热煤炭能有效地制作焦炭, 但小心别烧掉了, 焦炭是优质燃料.
coke_recipe.flavor: 是会用煤煨饭, 还是烧成焦煤, 用焦煤煨饭?

bulk_charcoal_recipe.description: 技术让铁匠更有效率地烧木头, 生产更多木炭.

bulk_iron_ingot_recipe.description: 高级熔炉让铁匠能更有效地处理铁矿.

copper_garden_lantern_recipe.description: 放在地上的小灯. 适合放在花园里照亮小径.

iron_platemail_recipe.flavor: 每个骑士都有萌新的时候...

steel_helm_recipe.description: 给头坚固但不是那么沉重的保护.

steel_chainmail_recipe.description: 给步兵的帅气坚固的锁甲.

light_iron_shield_recipe.description: 没那么沉也就没那么耐打.

silver_shield_recipe.description: 银做成的十分坚固的骑士盾.

iron_hatchet_recipe.description: 可以闪避或进攻的坚固小斧子. 让敌人失去平衡.

blacksmith_description.description: 铁匠使用原矿, 燃料和力量来来随意摆弄金属, 创造出一系列的物品, 有武器, 装甲, 装饰品和其他实用工具.

level_1_data.transform_perk_description: 木匠能够利用他们的技能和强大的金属锯将某些木制物品(如倒下的树干)雕刻成家具或其他艺术品!

chilly_simple_worker_outfit_recipe.description: 制作羊毛帽和手套.避寒,但没有额外的好处.

rc_winter_worker_outfit_recipe.description: 一件漂亮而厚实的羊毛装,可以保护自己免受寒冷天气的影响.还能提高速度.

na_freezing_worker_outfit_recipe.description: 最精致的北方工艺,耐磨且非常温暖的装备.防寒,提高速度.

backpack_cloth_recipe.description: 制作一个非常有用的配件,让工人在搬运时更有效率.
backpack_cloth_recipe.flavor: 带背包的工人不会因携带东西而减速,而且会更快打包/拆包

backpack_leather_recipe.description: 制作一个非常有用的配件,使工人在搬运时更有效率.
backpack_leather_recipe.flavor: 带背包的工人不会因携带东西而减速,而且会更快打包/拆包

sleeping_bag_recipe.description: 总比地上好但终究睡不舒服. 不过挺方便的!
sleeping_bag_recipe.flavor: 能带着走的床. 好吧, 理论上所有床你都能带走...

simple_quiver_bolts_recipe.description: A quiver equippable by an archer. The bolts encased by it will slow down enemies.
simple_quiver_bolts_recipe.flavor: A bolt quiver can only be worn with crossbows

curtains_wide_recipe.description: 常规窗帘不够宽的时候.

curtains_tall_recipe.description: 有时候窗子就想要一条长长的裙子.

ornate_curtains_recipe.description: 制作一副典雅漂亮的窗帘.
ornate_curtains_recipe.flavor: 光线从没被这么美丽地遮起来过

ornate_throw_rug_recipe.description: 织一块有漂亮图案的布.

ornate_banner_wall_recipe.description: 给繁荣小镇的装饰旗帜.

legendary_hood_recipe.description: 只有最精锐的弓箭手才配穿上的华丽斗篷.
legendary_hood_recipe.flavor: 没人能真正读懂上面写的文字. 但看起来很酷炫.

legendary_cape_recipe.description: 先驱者锁甲上编织而成的君王头套.
legendary_cape_recipe.flavor: 曾经这种头套是先驱者们的骄傲

porcelain_curtains_recipe.description: 能覆盖整面墙的大装饰.

chitin_helm_recipe.description: A good defense for one's head.

chitin_shield_recipe.description: A somewhat sturdy shield made of bug chitin.

level_2_data.gear_crafting_description: 纺织工已经获得了足够的知识和能力来制造织机并创造配件,作战设备和提供奖励或增强功能的服装.

level_3_data.extended_catalog_description: 纺织工可以使用许多材料,并可以提出几种新方法来缝制,缝合和拉伸纺织品来成为美妙的东西.

level_5_data.ornate_perk_description: 纺织工现在能够利用异国情调的资源创造具有出众魅力和美感的装饰品和其他商品.

level_6_data.mastery_description: 纺织工对其独特工艺的掌握使他们能够根据自己的意愿弯曲最粗糙的羊毛和最光滑的丝绸,创造出他们想要的任何东西.

weaver_description.description: 纺织工能把动物皮刮干净, 变成可以用的皮革, 把纤维编织成线, 他们的工作还能做出复杂的物品, 衣物, 装甲和装饰.

fish_trap.description: 能安全地抓到鱼. 放水里会浮起来.
fish_trap.iconic_description: Must be placed mostly underwater, will float. Can be accessed from above.
fish_trap.sprung_description: It caught something! It will soon be harvested by a Trapper...
fish_trap.empty_description: The trap was triggered but failed to get anything...

clamp_trap.description: 不那么安全地抓住猎物

level_1_data.trapper_level_1_description: Long walks have increased the trapper's foot speed. The Trapper is also able to handle up to 3 fish traps for your town.

level_3_data.trapper_level_3_description: Long practice helps the trapper salvage more from each animal. The added agility allows the Trapper to occupy themselves with 3 additional fish traps.

level_6_data.trapper_level_6_description: 猎人现在可以使用金属夹陷阱捕捉大型猎物,并且还教了工程师设置陷阱.城镇陷阱上限提升6个.

trapper_description.description: 猎人可以装备陷阱, 捕捉然后把野生动物(咳咳)"收获"作为可靠的食物, 皮毛或骨头来源.

shepherd_hood.description: 牧羊人使用的包着羊毛的棍子.

level_1_data.small_animals_description: 牧人刚刚开始掌握动物驯服技术,目前只能驯服小动物.

level_3_data.big_animals_description: 牧人现在对动物更有经验,可以驯服大型动物了.

level_5_data.exotic_animals_description: 牧人掌握了所有关于家畜的知识,甚至可以处理来自异国的神奇生物了.

level_6_data.level_6_description: 完全掌握牧人的交易可以让他们与任何动物形成更强大的联系.慈悲对动物的积极影响将持续更长时间,屠宰的负面影响将更短.

shepherd_description.description: 热爱自然的孤僻者, 牧羊人会圈养温顺的动物, 照顾它们, 然后收获蛋, 羊毛和肉类等的资源.

shepherd_crook_corn.description: 这把漂亮的杆子可以提升牧人的同情心, 增加动物的幸福度.

level_2_data.perk_000_description: 农民在每株庄稼上获得的收成提高25%.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: 农民可以使用给作物施肥, 有一定概率能提升作物的品质.

level_4_data.perk_000_description: 农民在每株庄稼上获得的收成提高50%.
level_4_data.perk_001_description: 花费太多时间在庄稼和植物上,使农民想到了照顾更多令人兴奋和互动生物的可能性...

level_6_data.perk_000_description: 农民在每株庄稼上获得的收成提高100%.

farmer_description.description: 农民能锄田, 播种和收获庄稼, 开发土地来持续提供食物, 或可供烹饪的食材, 或纤维, 草药等等.

farmer_mega_watermelon_hat.description: 农民带了会有一点点速度上的提升, 还能让他们的头保持新鲜.

seed.description: 种下后能长出一种会蔓延的花毯.

bud.description: 马上它们就满地都是了!

sprout.description: 它们总有一天会绽放美丽!

thatch_pile.iconic_description: 放下后可以采集获得干草捆.

fuel_holder_small.description: 这个好看的把手能储存柴薪这类燃料.

mega_golden_gourd_pot.description: 用强大水果的果壳制成,最多可储存16件物品.

food_trough_wood.description: 牧人用来为牧场上的动物提供食物的.

food_trough_stone.description: 牧人用来为牧场上的动物提供食物的.

food_trough_clay.description: 牧人用来为牧场上的动物提供食物的.

pet_food_bowl_wood.description: 炉民可以将粗磨食物放入这个木碗中供宠物食用.

pet_food_bowl_stone.description: 炉民可以将粗磨食物放入这个石碗中供宠物食用.

pet_food_bowl_clay_green.description: 炉民可以往这个粘土碗中放入粗磨食物来供他们的宠物食用.

pet_food_bowl_clay_blue.description: 炉民可以往这个粘土碗中放入粗磨食物来供他们的宠物食用.

fuel_holder_large_wood.description: 这种可靠的存储方式将使大量木柴干燥并随时可用！

fuel_holder_large_clay.description: 这种可靠的存储方式将使大量木柴干燥并随时可用！

bog_butter_keg.description: 很久以前有人埋葬了...泥炭土给黄油带来了独特的味道!

bone_chest.description: 毛骨悚然地容纳多达64件物品.

input_bin_bone.description: 为了更快和更奇怪的工艺.

input_table_ground_bone.description: 有时你需要正常的供应桌才不会打断工匠们工作.

output_box_bone.description: 深红色的布料给了它一些对比.

pet_food_bowl_bone.description: 炉民可以往这个令人毛骨悚然的碗里放入粗磨食物供他们的宠物吃.

input_keg_wood.description: A small serving container for 4 simple or prepared drinks.

input_keg_clay.description: A small serving container for 4 simple or prepared drinks.

input_keg_stone.description: A small serving container for 4 simple or prepared drinks.

barrel.description: Stores up to 24 items of a certain kind.

barrel_small.description: Stores up to 6 items of a certain kind.

amphora.description: Stores up to 24 items of a certain kind.

amphora_red.description: Stores up to 24 items of a certain kind.

amphora_blue.description: Stores up to 24 items of a certain kind.

amphora_green.description: Stores up to 24 items of a certain kind.

tank_small.description: Stores up to 6 items of a certain kind.

worker_axe_iron.description: 砍树时稍稍加快劈砍速度.

worker_hammer.description: 手里有把锤子的时候, 看什么都觉得是钉子.

mining_pick_iron.description: 小幅提升提高挖掘速度与挖出的资源品质.

mining_pick_steel.description: 大大提升提高挖掘速度与挖出的资源品质.

worker_axe_steel.description: 砍树时大大加快劈砍速度.

worker_hammer_iron.description: 小幅提升常规作业的速度, 例如建造.

worker_hammer_steel.description: 大幅提升常规作业的速度, 例如建造.

farmer_hoe_iron.description: 小幅提升农民工作速度.

backpack_leather.description: 让工人在搬运与储存作业时更有效率.

backpack_cloth.description: 让工人在搬运与储存作业时的效率大大提升.

worker_tools_iron.description: 工人使用它来提高工作效率和速度.

worker_tools_steel.description: 工人使用它来大大提高工作效率和速度.

blacksmith_hammer_steel.description: 提高铁匠的效率,使他们能够更快地制作.

carpenter_saw_steel.description: 木匠工具的改进版本,提供了更快的制作速度.

mason_chisel_iron.description: 这个增强工具让石匠的速度变快了.

potter_cutter_iron.description: 这种多用途的工具可以提高制陶时的效率.

trapper_knife_steel.description: 一种改进的,更强的刀,可以提高猎人的效率.

weaver_steel_needle.description: 一个镀银的针会让织布工更有效率!

simple_yellow.description: 它们将自动连接到附近的地毯!

simple_wooden.description: 它们将自动连接到附近的栏杆!

moomoo_milk.description: 温暖而光滑,直接来自健康的哞哞!

sheep_milk.description: 甜,这美味的奶来自一只羊!

wild_cattle_milk.description: 略带酸味和粗犷,这种牛奶来自野生动物.

beer.description: A flavorful brew. Makes hearthlings happy but also a little tipsy!

wort.description: An extract from grains. The Cook or Herbalist need it to fill a fermentation vat!

spirit.description: A dry, complex and moderate brew. Makes hearthlings happy but also tipsy!

spirit_fruit.description: A fruity, savoury moderate brew. Makes hearthlings happy but also tipsy!

liquor.description: A strong and sweet brew. Makes hearthlings happy but also quite tipsy!

tea_iconic.description: Place it somewhere so hearthlings can serve themselves!

tea.description: An aromatic and warm beverage. Very appreciated by many!

tea_fancy.description: The elegant and heartwarming flavor of dried daisies and fruits.

tea_fancy_serving.description: A civilized drink for a civilized age.

tea_desert.description: An unique recipe to the children of Rayya, a flower tea from Pal'Mum.

tea_amberstone.description: A traditional recipe from the clan, delighting palates for centuries.

juice_berry.description: A fruity and tasty beverage from wild berries.

juice_carrot.description: A nutritious and refreshing drink made of fruits and carrots.

juice_cherry.description: A sour, flavorful beverage made with wild cherries.

juice_prickly_pear.description: An interesting beverage made from prickly pears. Hopefully with no spines.

juice_watermelon.description: Deliciously refreshing juice from ripe watermelons.

juice_heirbloom.description: A tasty juice with the peculiar, strong taste of heirbloom fruits.

smoothie.description: The fruity flavors go perfectly with the milk in this refreshing, sweet beverage.

water_serving.description: The foundation of life!... Also quite bland.

gruit.description: A bundle of bitter, dried herbs. Cooks and Herbalists use it to make beer.

ale.description: A fruity, sweet brew. Makes hearthlings happy but also a little tipsy!

bucket.description: Whatever it was, it's probably not wise to drink it anymore...

keg.description: This drink has, surprisingly, spoiled. It took a very long time.

milk.description: Milk goes bad in a very short time, it's better to drink or use it fast!

water_serving_cool.description: Just perfect, kept fresh and cool by the rocky undeground!

water_serving_spring.description: This water is almost... magical?! Feels renewing!

thorulf.description: A former Explorer of the Library

goblin.description: A trophy from defeating goblins... Must have some value!

red_kiln.description: A trophy from defeating servants of the warchief... Must have a good value!

titan.description: A trophy from corrupted, abyssal beings... Must have an excellent value!

undead.description: A trophy from defeating the undead... Must have quite some value!

forest.description: A trophy from defeating minions of the wilds... Must have a bit of value!

craftsdwarf_party.description: 勤奋的民族永远不会在开荒期放弃自己的特长, 而工艺师绝对是矮人工艺的顶尖.
craftsdwarf_party.tooltip: 用顶尖的工艺助你开荒.

kingdom.quote: 亲近自然, 均衡的身体与高超的手艺永远是他们在逆境中生存的资本.
kingdom.long_description: 高原山脉里与外界隔离, 独自在世袭民主体制下繁荣了好长时间的, 壮硕又守旧的居民. 现在他们要出发面对一个新世界了, 那里的科技和力量究竟会带来福还是祸...
kingdom.post_selection_description: , 是迫切寻求改变生活的隐居矮人们.

grower_description.description: 园丁可以去培养植物和真菌之类的, 能够照顾地上地下的农田, 制作草药并且治疗伤口.

grower_trowel_talisman.description: 可以把炉民转职成园丁

grower_trowel_equipped.description: 园丁能用来制作物品, 或者栽培植物, 真菌之类的.

grower_workbench_ghost.description: 园丁用来干燥, 精炼和制作的地方.

grower_terrarium_ghost.description: 园丁用来制作品种栽培, 真菌菌落和处理植物的地方.

grower_workbench_recipe.description: 用来干燥, 精炼和制作的地方.

grower_terrarium_recipe.description: 用来制作品种栽培, 解锁新种子, 培养真菌和处理植物的地方.
grower_terrarium_recipe.flavor: 可栽培的植物随便放, 等它们长成能用的!

gruit_recipe.description: A bundle of bitter herbs and seasonings. Birch catkins are often used in the highlands.
gruit_recipe.flavor: The Cook or Herbalist can add it to a Fermentation Vat with Ale to make beer

artificer_staff_talisman.description: 可以把炉民转职成工艺师

artificer_staff_equipped.description: 一件高级工具, 能运送传导石炉世界和机械的能量.

sweet_varanus_recipe.description: 很传统的矮人料理, 由巨蜥肉和当地的樱桃烹饪而成.

highland_trout_recipe.description: 高原民族最喜欢的的珍贵菜肴之一.

brass_plate_recipe.description: 廉价但耐用的金属板, 可以用作家具材料或建材.
brass_plate_recipe.flavor: 要点就是把铜旁边的什么东西都融化掉

steel_plate_recipe.description: 一块坚固且值钱的金属板, 可以用作家具材料或建材.

artificer_staff_recipe.description: 可以把炉民转职成工艺师.
artificer_staff_recipe.flavor: '曲折的火焰和大地的能量合二为一, 布洛菲克将生命的低语向金银传递' 工艺纲要 I

brass_sign_blacksmith_recipe.flavor: 专业处理沉重, 尖锐, 高密度的家伙!

grower_trowel_recipe.description: 可以把炉民转职成园丁.

brass_training_dummy_recipe.description: 近战士兵可以通过和这个友好的家伙练手来获得经验.
brass_training_dummy_recipe.flavor: 维护修理需要工艺师来完成.

brass_training_target_recipe.description: 远程士兵可以以它为靶子练习来获得经验.
brass_training_target_recipe.flavor: 维护修理需要工艺师来完成.

mf_camp_standard_ghost.description: 标志着所有山脉居民的家!

mf_town_banner_balance_ghost.description: 这些山脉居民们相信古老教条与新式方法之间的均衡才能让他们繁荣!

mf_town_banner_balance_token_iconic.description: 来自均衡旗帜的一角, 继承着它的祝福.

mf_town_banner_might_ghost.description: 许多山脉居民坚信只有烈火与工业的锻炼才能给与他们进步.

mf_town_banner_might_token_iconic.description: 来自力量旗帜的一角, 继承着它的祝福.

mf_town_banner_nature_ghost.description: 许多山脉居民们永远会遵循古老的传统.

mf_town_banner_nature_token_iconic.description: 来自蓬勃旗帜的一角, 继承着它的祝福.

sweet_varanus_serving.description: 一道传统而美味的荤菜.

attach_to_connector.tip_description: 这件物品必须放置在机械连接器上, 例如零件想, 轮轴, 或是动力磨

harvest_and_replant.description: 在地面上砍树, 采药, 挖石头, 可以的情况下会把种子种回去.

box_move.tip_title: 点击拖动选择要移动的物品, 再及时点击新区域挨个放下来.

box_undeploy.tip_title: 点击拖动选中要收起来的物品.

box_enable_auto_harvest.description: 对你拥有的可再生资源使用自动采集功能 (再次收获采集仍需手动).
box_enable_auto_harvest.tip_title: 点击拖动选中要启用自动采集的已拥有的可再生资源.

box_disable_auto_harvest.description: 对你拥有的可再生资源不使用自动采集功能.
box_disable_auto_harvest.tip_title: 点击拖动选中要禁用自动采集的已拥有的可再生资源.

box_hunt.description: 标记特定动物以便狩猎.
box_hunt.tip_title: 单击并拖动以标记它们.

heatmap.name: 热图
heatmap.title: 地形热图
heatmap.description: 实用的各种视图, 可以让你看清地图上不同方面的情况

ore.description: 探测区域下部若干层的矿脉: 矿产丰富或者贴近表层的会显示得更亮.

wilderness.description: 查看地图上哪里比较原始 (或被开发).

craft_button.title: 制作
craft_button.description: 把这份订单加到制作列表最后. 按住 [Shift] 将其插入到制作列表开头.

quality_preference.title: 材料质量偏好
quality_preference.description: 选择让工匠制作此订单时, 偏好高等级的优质还是劣质的原材料. 默认属性能在游戏设置中更改.

fertilizer_settings.title: 肥料
fertilizer_settings.specific_description: 请在下面选择一种肥料,以仅使用该特定肥料.

season.property_description: 这种作物更喜欢[str(i18n_data.season)] 季节,并且会在首选季节之外变得更慢.
season.in_season: 这种作物目前正处于生长季节,因此将以正常速度生长.
season.out_of_season: 这种作物目前不适宜种植,而且生长速度会比较慢.
season.no_season_description: 这种作物没有任何首选的季节,一年四季都能正常生长.

growth_time.short: 这种作物很快就会成熟 ([str(i18n_data.total_growth_time)] before modifiers).
growth_time.fair: 这种作物成熟率适中 ([str(i18n_data.total_growth_time)] before modifiers).
growth_time.long: 这种作物要花很长时间才能成熟 ([str(i18n_data.total_growth_time)] before modifiers).
growth_time.shorter: 环境因素使这种作物生长 [str(i18n_data.growth_time_percent)] faster than normal!
growth_time.normal: 环境因素使这种作物以正常的速度生长.
growth_time.longer: 环境因素使这种作物生长 [str(i18n_data.growth_time_percent)] slower than normal!
growth_time.too_long: 环境因素使这种作物的生长速度比正常情况慢 因为环境因素!
growth_time.stopped: 该作物的生长 目前已停止.

water_affinity.range: 当 [str(i18n_data.min_water_level)] - [str(i18n_data.max_water_level)]水,通过其一般环境或在其蓝色轮廓区域内灌溉,这种作物将会更快地生长.
water_affinity.min_only: 至少在[str(i18n_data.min_water_level)] 水位,通过其一般环境,或在其蓝色轮廓区域内灌溉,这种作物的生长速度会快一点.
water_affinity.current_level: 该作物目前通过其一般环境 [str(i18n_data.current_water_level)]水位 在其蓝色区域内灌溉.

light_affinity.range: 当[str(i18n_data.min_light_level)] - [str(i18n_data.max_light_level)] 白天阳光时,此作物的成长速度将比平常快.
light_affinity.min_only: 至少[str(i18n_data.min_light_level)] 日间阳光此作物的生长速度会快一些.
light_affinity.current_level: 此作物当前经历[str(i18n_data.current_light_level)]日间阳光. 这考虑了阴影和当前的天气状况.

flooded.requires: 这种作物必须有水覆盖才能生长.
flooded.prefers: 当水覆盖作物时,它生长得更快,而不覆盖作物时,它生长得更慢.
flooded.prefers_not: 当水或雪覆盖作物时,它生长得更慢.
flooded.current_flooded: 这片田地 目前 已被淹没.
flooded.current_not_flooded: 这片田地 目前还没有 被淹没.

fertilized.current_amount: [str(i18n_data.num_fertilized)] / [str(i18n_data.num_crops)] 这片田地目前正在被施肥.

underfarm.substrate_description: 你需要一层有机层来种庄稼.

pasture.maintain_animals_description: 自动屠宰超过这个数量的任何动物.
pasture.harvest_animals_renewable_description: 从这些动物身上获取可再生资源,如羊毛或鸡蛋.
pasture.harvest_grass_description: 自动收割牧场上生长的任何草.
pasture.ostrich_pasture_description: 这些异国鸟产美味的大鸡蛋,可以屠宰成大型家禽肉,肉干,羽毛和骨头.
pasture.sheep_pasture_description: 绵羊产羊毛,很少产牛奶.宰羊会获得生羊肉,肉干和骨头.
pasture.moomoo_pasture_description: 哞哞牛吃得很多,但产奶量不错.屠宰它们会获得毛皮,牛排,肉干和骨头
pasture.rabbit_pasture_description: 兔子繁殖迅速,可以被屠宰成肉干,毛皮,有时还有骨头.
pasture.poyo_pasture_description: 波波鸡会下蛋,是一种很好的烹饪配料.宰杀波波鸡会产肉,通常还会产羽毛和骨头.

patrol_banners.window_title: 军队模式: 巡逻旗帜
patrol_banners.move_banner_up_description: 在巡逻顺序中向上移动选定的路线.
patrol_banners.move_banner_down_description: 在巡逻顺序中向下移动选定的路线.
patrol_banners.create_banner_description: 在命令末尾或当前选定路线之后立即为此参与方创建新路线.
patrol_banners.clear_banners_description: 移除这个小队的所有路线.要删除选定路线,请使用“选定实体”窗口上的指令.

show_promotion_tree.tooltip_description: 单击此处可将此炉民转职到其他工作.

toggle_component_info.tooltip_description: 单击此处可显示或隐藏有关此实体的其他信息.

crafter.description: Civillian jobs that are able to create items out of raw materials and resources. Carpenter or Blacksmith, for example.

combat.description: Military jobs that are able to follow orders and engage in combat to defend the town! Footmen or Archers, for example.

field_work.description: Civillian jobs that will specialize in specifc, diverse activities outside of the main crafting chains. Farmers or Shepherds, for example.

drink.high: This drink provides [str(servings)] highly satisfying servings
drink.average: This drink provides [str(servings)] somewhat satisfying servings
drink.low: This drink provides [str(servings)] mildly satiating servings

food.high: This food provides [str(servings)] very filling meals
food.average: This food provides [str(servings)] quite filling meals

new_title.title: [str(i18n_data.entity.stonehearth:unit_info.custom_name)]已经取得了新的称号!
new_title.message:
[str(i18n_data.new_title.description)]

这个称号不是很好吗?您可以通过在您的公民的字符表或所选单位窗口中右键单击他们的姓名来选择他们使用的头衔.
new_title.item_message:
[str(i18n_data.new_title.description)]

那个头衔有枚漂亮的戒指吗?你可以通过在“选定的单位”窗口中右键单击该项的名称,可以选择该市民使用的头衔.

您也可以考虑通过在所选单位窗口中左键单击其名称来为 [str(i18n_data.entity.stonehearth:unit_info.custom_name)]添加一个更新的名称.

gameplayTab.auto_craft_recipe_dependencies_descripti: 当制作物品时, 工匠会检查库存内是否有足够原材料可供使用. 若不够, 他们会自动加入更多订单来满足初始订单.
gameplayTab.auto_craft_killed_items_description: 当你的门,训练假人或防御武器被损耗时,将会直接添加替补品到工艺订单.
gameplayTab.default_craft_order_prefer_high_quality_: 制作物品时, 原材料进行制作. 不勾选此项则永远优先使用低等级的原材料.
gameplayTab.show_unreachable_ingredients_notificatio: 当一个工匠的材料不足时将会收到警告:这可能会引起很多警告!
gameplayTab.auto_harvest_enabled_description: 当你拥有的资源可以收获采集时, 自动对该资源下达采集命令.
gameplayTab.auto_harvest_tree_stumps_description: 砍倒树后, 剩下的树桩仍然可以砍. 启用这一选项会自动添加砍伐树桩的命令.
gameplayTab.default_to_worst_fertilizer_description: 当农民施肥时, 除非有指定使用某一类型, 否则他们会优先使用最好的肥料. 勾选此项可以让农民优先使用最差的肥料.
gameplayTab.default_fertilizer_description: 创建新农场时,请将其肥料偏好设置为此.
gameplayTab.show_new_title_notification_description: When one of your citizens (or other items) achieves a title, display an in-game notification about it.
gameplayTab.auto_select_new_titles_description: 当您的一个公民(或其他物品)获得一个头衔时,自动选择它作为他们的启动头衔.
gameplayTab.terrain_slice_buildings_description: 在地片模式下, 不会渲染可视但不构成地形的物体.
gameplayTab.water_signal_update_frequency_descriptio: 决定水系统过了多少tick后才更新一次水信号. 增加它的值可以提高许多和水有关功能的性能表现.
gameplayTab.show_processing_meter_description: 在屏幕右下角的游戏速度按钮左侧显示电脑处理仪表,有助于理解性能问题.
gameplayTab.show_component_info_description: 当所选实体具有其他详细信息时,在所选单元窗口上显示可单击的信息按钮.
gameplayTab.auto_save_max_files_description: 将会改变游戏自动保存的文件数,当自动保存的数量多于那个数量时则会替换掉最旧的.
gameplayTab.auto_save_interval_description: 在“保存”框中启用“自动保存”后,将按此频率自动保存.
gameplayTab.auto_save_unique_files_description: 当自动保存时,用日期和时间创建一个单独的保存.警告:频繁的自动保存需要大量的存储空间!

bullet_points.000: The value itself represents a bonus percentage added over every experience gain.

equipment_piece.description: 可以装备到某些炉民身上.

evolve.description: 似乎会随着时间发展而变成别的东西.

growing.description: 有多个成长阶段,受附近的水量与阴雨天影响.

loot_drops.description: 杀了某群小王八羔子之后抢他们掉落的东西!

renewable_resource_node.description: 可以反复收获，每次收获之后需要一些时间才会再长出来

resource_node.description: 只能被收获一次的资源点,收获之后就会飞升消失.

stacks.description: 当用于制作或交易时,所有的堆积物都会被消耗殆尽,或者,一次只消耗一堆,直到所有的堆积物都被消耗光.

fence.description: 会自动连接到其他的栅栏上.

mechanical.description: 可用于创造机械传输动力或仅仅只是创造机械.
mechanical.produces: 这个机械设备目前正在生产 [str(produces)] / [str(def_produces)] 功率.
mechanical.consumes: 这个机械设备目前正在消耗 [str(consumes)] / [str(def_consumes)] 功率.
mechanical.resistance: 这个机械设备正在引起 [str(resistance)] / [str(def_resistance)] 电流阻碍.
mechanical.power_percentage: 这组机械正在以 [str(power_percentage)] % 的效率下运行.

pile.description: 放置在地上之后将可以收获的资源.
pile.item_list_header: 这个项目将包含以下 [str(item_count)] 物品:

tile.description: 瓦砖会自动拼凑并且链接.

titles.description: 可以为该实体提供将在其名称后显示的头衔. 右键单击所选单位窗口中的名称或其字符表（如果有的话）以选择其他头衔.
titles.unattained: 这是他还未达到的下一等级.

transform.description: 在他工作的时候让他打断手头的工作去做别的事情.

vine.description: 通过递增来成长,每一株只会成长几次,可能会爬上某些地形或是建筑.

water_pump.description: 启动后它会从底部抽水并从顶部喷水.

cheese.description: 这个奶酪已经有了点杰哥的味道,最好赶紧吃掉它.

curdling.description: 杰哥的味道越来越重了!最好尽快放入奶酪桶中!

shipwreck_crate.description: 砸开它!拿走里面装的宝藏!或者里面装的是宝藏吗?

shipwreck_chest.description: 收获它作为战利品,不管是谁弄丢的它都不会介意的......对吗?

decay_1.description: It's starting to go bad, should probably drink it soon.

keg.description: Has been around for a long while and is a bit stale already.
